channel.title: I need a Client that can run AllstarV2
channel.description: Okay so i was finally able to get a source and jdk installed ,but when i try to run my server (All-star V2) it well keep disconnecting me when i use the Moparscape V3.2 with aryan client... and then i used a pkz client did same thing. So Please if anybody could give me a client for Allstar scape please do.

Don’t open any other windows.
